ec    # debian: "whois.nic.ec is restricted", however it provides enough details - including creation, expiration - to use it
ki    # http://www.iana.org/domains/root/db/ki.html whois.nic.ki timeouts
md    # debian: "whois.nic.md is restricted", however it provides enough details - including creation, expiration - to use it
mn    # http://www.iana.org/domains/root/db/mn.html whois.nic.mn tested and not working. maintenance page
mp    # http://www.iana.org/domains/root/db/mp.html whois.nic.mp doesn't work
so    # http://www.iana.org/domains/root/db/so.html whois.nic.so doesn't work
fo    # http://www.iana.org/domains/root/db/fo.html empty, but whois.ripe.net works
gm    # http://www.iana.org/domains/root/db/gm.html empty, but whois.ripe.net works
mc    # http://www.iana.org/domains/root/db/mc.html empty, but whois.ripe.net works
va    # http://www.iana.org/domains/root/db/va.html empty, but whois.ripe.net works
wf    # http://www.iana.org/domains/root/db/wf.html provides whois.nic.wf, but using whois.nic.fr for compatibility with debian whois and to reuse parser
yt    # http://www.iana.org/domains/root/db/wf.html provides whois.nic.yt, but using whois.nic.fr for compatibility with debian whois and to reuse parser
